question: CSIR-CLRI is conducting a national survey on which subject, to formulate an Indian standard?
explanation:
CSIR-Central Leather Research Institute (CLRI) is conducting a pan India survey of feet scanning. The results of the survey would define the footwear size standards in India.
Sizes with the measuring standards named ‘EU’, ‘UK’ or ‘US’ are commonly followed in India, while making and in buying. After the survey, the institute will formulate a standard so that India will have its own ‘Footwear Sizing System’.
